name: ax-distr
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(c0, cmul, co(c1, caddc, c2)), co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(c0, cmul, c2))))
comment: Distributive law for complex numbers (left-distributivity). Axiom 11 of 22 for real and complex numbers, justified by theorem ~ axdistr . Proofs should normally use ~ adddi instead. (New usage is discouraged.) (Contributed by NM, 22-Nov-1994.)
